website_summaries.verdict: Your child may never tire of the song, and they don't have to with this cuddly singing baby shark.
pros: Plays 4 full verses of the hit song Baby Shark
Well covered batteries without any sharp Velcro edges
cons: If the sound box isn't placed correctly, the song can sound muffled

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be like any other stuffed animal you press the stomach on and it plays music.... But I was wrong. When pushing the baby sharks stomach you care barely hear the music. I looked inside and there’s only a tiny box that plays the song, not attached to the shark. If you really want to hear the song, take the box out and press it. Otherwise it’s super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: kmbh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute bigger than I expected which is great and they're super soft! The song is at a perfect volume it's not crazy loud! Got them on pre-order for $16.99! My daughter is gonna be so happy Christmas morning! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: steve ballog

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. The shark itself seems to be good quality. The music box on the other hand is very cheaply made and thrown in the shark. It is fully removable and has no “off” switch or volume switch. It’s a little 1x1 music box and only sings through the mommy, daddy and baby parts. It leaves out the rest of the song. I wouldn’t recommend this product unless you want it just for the stuffed animal
customer_reviews.author: D2010

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED!!! >:(
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival I was happy at how it looked almost exactly like the Pink Fong shark, but that’s about it. First of all, the price is ridiculous for what you get. It’s supposed to be a cuddly soft shark for a toddler, but it feels almost too tough to almost hug. The best part was supposed to be the song, WHICH IT DOESNT EVEN SING COMPLETELY. It stops singing right after daddy shark which is a huge disappointment since my child keeps singing to granny shark but stops when he realizes the shark isn’t singing anymore. To add to it, the button is difficult for a toddler to possibly find or even press.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Roy III

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product lived up to its name. To be honest, I was a little worried that it was gonna be cheap materials, but it wasn’t. I have boys who buys Pokémon plush, and I would say it feels like that. I would get it if you have or know a child who loves baby shark. And, it’s not too loud either like some toys that comes with a song. So you can rest easy knowing that your child could play this song over and over and over and not be too annoyed by it. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: mys

customer_reviews.title: keeps my 1 year old entertained and happy
customer_reviews.text: Update: I bought one for a friend and it didn't work, they did a return instantly but I was moving and didn't get to mail the defective one back...just check yours as soon as you get it. Other than that it is awesome and my son and my friends daughter LOVE them If you hate the baby shark song then do not buy this. My son plays the song over and over and over! But it keeps him entertained and he absolutely loves it. I on the other hand could never hear baby shark again and be happy
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for 'baby shark' obsessed toddler
customer_reviews.text: Shark was delivered on time with no damage. Color is true and stitching is clean, no loose pieces to cut off. Size wise, it's small enough for toddlers to pick up, hut big enough to enjor as a stuffed animal. Speaker was easy to push and had good sound, song is identical to what you hear on the radio. I liked that a second push of the button stops the song, you don't have to listen to the whole song every time. Velcro on back makes it easy to access speaker to change batteries (or just remove them, depends on the parent!). Can't wait to gift this to my 2 yr old niece!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The joys of having a 2 year old.......
customer_reviews.text: So this baby shark stuff might be the death of me. This stuffed animal is so cute, plays the baby shark song over and over. My two year old is obsessed. I went to work singing this freaking song... WHY DIDNT ANYONE WARN ME!!! If your child loves baby shark like mine does, they will scream when they open this one up. Just be a good parent like me and suck it up and buy this for your child. Long live baby shark and goodbye to my sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Dani👻

customer_reviews.title: A family hit!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! The only problem... for the kids anyways, is that it doesn’t go through the entiiire song... which is however not to bad for adults!! It’s cute though. My kids are all obsessed with baby shark & this was a total hit!! Will have to grab more soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Cel & Pat

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old daughter is obsessed with this song and this was the perfect addition to her "stuffy" collection. She loves that it sings the song. You know what I love? The volume of the song...it's the perfect volume! She can hear it when she's playing with it and I can be semi-close and just faintly hear it. It's not like other toys in which the audio is blaring and I have to be tortured by it. (And eventually hide it somewhere to save my sanity)
customer_reviews.author: SJL

customer_reviews.title: Toddler likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for someone else. Had it sitting on top of the boxes of other gifts, and my toddler stared at it each time she saw it so I ordered one for her. She has a little trouble pushing hard enough to make it sing, but she likes it, especially when I make it dance and ‘kiss her’ and make it dance with her! She will bring it to me so I can turn the song on and says ‘shark’ in her cute baby voice:)
customer_reviews.author: CRS

customer_reviews.title: Song doesn’t play long
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to sing longer but I kept it since it was $17 when pre ordered. I was going to buy another for my nephew but distributors purchased them all & selling at $99 which was insane so I emailed Amazon on how disappointing it was they let that happened. Now $45 from 3rd party. Not worth that cost for a few seconds of the song. Son loves the videos but doesn’t pay much attention to it.
customer_reviews.author: marcy

customer_reviews.title: Batteries were dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing wrong with the shark itself, but the first thing I noticed was that the little box that goes inside it, didn't have a plastic tab in the slot. It wasn't working. I could've returned it, but my son got a chance to see it, so any parent can confirm that it would've been hell to take it back. He loved it, but I took 2 stars off for the inconvenience I went through of having to buy new batteries when the ones the shark came with, should've been new.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift for a Baby Shark lover
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the people who left negative reviews received a defective item, but our Baby Shark came in perfect condition! It was a birthday gift to our daughter and we had nothing to complain about it. It was well made, the sound didn't have any problem and it is at the right volume. It's our girl's favorite plushie now.
customer_reviews.author: Thiep Nguyen II

customer_reviews.title: Sweetest little gift.
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old granddaughter watches a children's sho that sings the song this little shark does and when she heard baby shark do do do do do do she spun her head around with the biggest smile, reached for and hugged it so tight and they've been best friends ever since. Best birthday gift I could've given her.
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: Sound not good
customer_reviews.text: - I was excited to gift this toy to my niece but there are some defects with it. - first off, the song doesn’t come for the belly, but instead you have to push inside the sharks mouth - the song sounds very glitchy, slow, and sounds like the sound box is dying despite it being new - not even half of the song plays when pushing the button -I got mine with a light black stain on the back
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for such a low price point. My 4 y/o loves it. The volume was fine--not too loud, not too soft. We were at the Baby Shark show the week before purchasing and they were selling this same toy for $40. My son whined since I refused to buy it at the show. Purchased this little cutie for less than half that price on Amazon as we drove away from the show and received it 3 days later. Awesome! Update: happened to look up this toy again and the price went up. I paid less than the current price of $21
customer_reviews.author: Islandfox

customer_reviews.title: Sound not very loud
customer_reviews.text: This was my first pickup on the treasure truck. I had to rush over in rush hour traffic to get there on time. The sound was not very good I could hardly hear it singing. My grand nephew didn't care much for it, but all the adults at the birthday party loved it. I probably will not use the treasure truck again, I would next time have the item delivered to my house if they are the same price.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday present ever for baby shark lovers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these as birthday gifts for the 2 toddlers I provide childcare for. Boy did they LOVE them!!!! The song is just like the one that you hear on YouTube, and the button is easy to press for little ones. You can either hug baby shark or just press down on his tummy to have the song play. I love that the whole family of baby sharks is sold too! This makes for a great gift! 10/10 would buy again! Its the perfect size too. Not too big and not too small. They really did a great job on this!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney B

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I almost didnt buy baby shark based on so many bad reviews. I took a chance and bought it anyways and I'm glad I did. I ordered baby shark and I received baby shark. The sound is very pleasant, not to loud but just right. And it does play the whole song. Don't know what all those bad reviews were about. I know my granddaughter will love this little baby shark.
customer_reviews.author: M.W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this toy. It’s a sturdy, quality stuffed plush with a tiny voice box. IT IS AWESOME! It’s one of the quietest toys we own, which is great because my child stays quiet trying to listen to it. There is only one volume setting which is a low one so you don’t have to listen to this song on blast over and over again. It sings to the end of the “Lets Go Hunt” verse. Really happy with it! And my 18 month old sons mind is blown
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Baby shark!
customer_reviews.text: We sent this to our niece who lives in a different state and when we called to ask how she liked it, she told us how much she loved it and how nice we were and how she loved us so much and I basically cried. We had her play the toy so we could hear and make sure it played the entire song, and it does...so I'm really not sure why others are saying it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn M Muncy-Feyh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, plays most of song
customer_reviews.text: Finally a toy you can take the sound box out to wash!!!! Not only do my kids love it, theres a velcro opening in the back so you can pop out the music box to wash the shark. No wires attached!!!! I didn't have to handwash it either. Just popped it in the washer and dryer then put the music box back it. Super easy to clean, sound is great, sings almost the entire song except let's go hunt, run away, and it's the end.
customer_reviews.author: nicole farmer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for Christmas morning☹️
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I tried it before Christmas morning. It doesn’t work! I am so angry, here it is Dec 20th and I have no main present for my 1.5 year old grandson ( this is his favorite song)I preferred 3 weeks ago and reserved it to make sure he would have Christmas morning. SOOOO DISAPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Russella Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough! :(
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this toy for my nephew. The toy is really cute but I wish the music was louder. The music is very quiet! I even changed the batteries to see if that made a difference in the music but it did not. I was dissapointed with the music part. Still a cute stuffed animal for him to cuddle with though!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra H

customer_reviews.title: Sound box floats around inside
customer_reviews.text: The lack of stars in my rating is because the sound box is not attached inside the shark. So it moves around fairly easily and my little one gets frustrated because he remembers where he squeezed, tries it, bir the sound box moved so there's no sound and he has to search for it again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old absolutely loves it. The quality of the stuffed animal is great. The music box inside is a little quiet as others have mentioned but I actual prefer it that way. It's loud enough to great but not distruptive if she plays it 5 times in a row. We have it to her yesterday and she hasn't let it go yet. If your kids like baby shark this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: IronChefMIk

customer_reviews.title: My Son Is Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing! We bought it for him for Christmas, and he literally sleeps with it every night! I gave it 4 stars because it says it plays the whole song but, it actually cuts off before the "run away" part of it... which happens to be my sons favorite. He lost interest initially after discovering that but, it didn't last very long. It's big and plushy as stated, and worth the price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: paula sanchez

customer_reviews.title: My 18 month old LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Item is absolutely perfect. My son was so excited to open. It is the perfect size for my 18mo old, is brightly colored, and is nice and soft. The song plays the baby shark, mommy shark, daddy shark lyrics (no grandparents) and is a tad faster than the normal song. My son doesnt mind that. You can easily turn it off by squeezing the belly again. My only complaint is that it is a tad quiet. If the TV is going at the same time you cant hear the song.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Escamilla

customer_reviews.title: Baby Approves
customer_reviews.text: My one year old grandson loves baby shark and this shark doll did not disappoint. I do wish the button inside the doll that you push down on to get the song, was easier to push down. Sometimes it’s difficult for little baby hands to push that hard. But still, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: DMak

customer_reviews.title: Mission Accomplished
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like the picture! It was gifted to my 4-year-old shark-loving nephew for his birthday. Along with the fact the he loved it, I was successful in annoying my little sister with that song playing non-stop until the batteries run out. I'm almost afraid to see what she gets my child for his upcoming birthday as payback. Still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like
customer_reviews.text: My daughter especially likes watching TV and dancing sharks, so I bought her this baby shark. She looks like she has liked it so far If you also have a baby who is 2 years old and 8 months old, I recommend you buy this and try it. She may be willing to sit in a car seat. At least after my baby has this, I can easily put her in the car seat
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand niece who is 14mths old. She love the baby shark songs! I found the volume to be really low and it is a little difficult for her to press the mechanism in the tummy (take away a star for volume and difficulty). She definitely likes it though!
customer_reviews.author: Thecla Duncombe

customer_reviews.title: Quality product minus the battery life.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the baby shark song so thought this Christmas gift would be a huge hit! Upon arrival the battery was almost completely dead where you could barely hear the song. Replaced battery once and it is already starting to do the same thing. The quality of the stuffed animal is great just having issues with the sound.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: iPad/iPhone saver
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot bigger than I thought it was going to be but I don’t mind it. It is the perfect size for my 2 year old. It has an opening on the back so that you can switch the batteries if needed which is a big plus. It could be a little louder though. I do love that it has the option to turn it off mid song by pushing the belly again. Overall I’m so glad I purchased it. Our local Walmart started selling these and they sold out in days.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Cute stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if we got a dud...My daughter loved it immediately of course, but you can barely hear the song when you press it. Tried adjusting the speaker to face outward and it was barely audible.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within TWO DAYS
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product at first, super soft, sang a good portion of the song. Two days after we gifted it for our child's birthday it stopped working. Seeing as it takes two LR44 batteries, it's going to cost more to constantly replace batteries even more than it's getting played with.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Will work but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 2 year old niece. The volume is pretty low which can be good because you don't have to hear the song all day long but bad because it's too low to hear unless you are holding it close. It also doesn't sing the whole song, it does the baby verse, mommy verse, daddy verse, then let's go hint verse.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: ah
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to buy this but my daughter absolutely loves it and once the novelty of the song wore off now its just another plush in the collection. I appreciated that it was not too loud (some toys are just AWFUL this one is good) and I was impressed with the quality of how it was sewn for the price
customer_reviews.author: Doot

customer_reviews.title: If you couldn't before -
customer_reviews.text: If you couldn't get that baby shark song out of your head before, you certainly won't with this little booger sitting around to remind you of it! This is the best stuffed toy baby shark I've ever gotten my wife (indeed it is the only stuffed toy baby shark). She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: RSS

customer_reviews.title: Volume on the voice box is very low
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, soft and a pretty yellow. It works fine and packaging was good. The only reason I gave it a 4 star is because the song is hard to hear if my tv is on. The volume on it is very very low which can be an upside (not having to hear that same song playing loud over and over) when your baby is playing with it however, I bought it for my 1 year old and I wish it was loud enough to call his attention.
customer_reviews.author: Perla nunez

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for the Baby Shark lovers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Baby Shark! We bought this for her when she got her big girl bed. She had the biggest smile when she saw it. I think it is a little pricey. It is worth it for the Baby Shark loving babies and kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsayb

customer_reviews.title: He’s so cuddly! And the volume isn’t too loud!
customer_reviews.text: Awwww! Who doesn’t love Baby Shark?! He’s so soft and cuddly. He’s a good size; not too big, not too small. It doesn’t sing the entire song. It leaves out grandma and grandpa. Your toddler will pick up on that. The volume is great. It’s not loud at all which saves my sanity. If your kid is a fan, this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: CCC

customer_reviews.title: Volume is good and easy to turn on and off
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot bigger than I expected but the volume is not super loud so it’s not as annoying as it could be considering you’ll be hearing the song A LOT 😅 You can also stop the singing mid song by pressing the foot unlike some Toys
customer_reviews.author: Atagirl

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy with Baby Shark
customer_reviews.text: Received baby shark in new plastic wrap took out to wrap for my grand baby to give to her for her birthday and some of the stitching around the front white part of the baby shark is not there, missing. Already coming apart, can't give that to a one year old. What if that comes off and chokes her?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's 2nd birthday, and she loves it. I would have given 5 stars, but it doesn't play the full song and it's hard for my daughter to turn it on. I haven't quite figured out if the low volume is a pro or a con, but I suppose it could be either depending on who you are. Otherwise it's soft and seems well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but too small for price
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old absolutely loves the baby shark melodies! So I was excited to see this baby shark plush which plays the melody. Im sad to say it's smaller than what i thought especially for the $20 price tag. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: TDog

customer_reviews.title: Dead batteries
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a gift for tomorrow, 11/29/19. When received, it didn't work. Found both batteries dead. It appeared it was supposed to have one of those plastic battery insulator strips so the batteries would stay fresh, and when you're ready to use, remove the strip. Found no strip. (screwdriver is pointing to where strip should stick out ready for removal) Now we have to scramble to buy new batteries. Assumed this was a returned item or a defect from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: dandor

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with the grandaughter.
customer_reviews.text: She just discovered Baby Shark videos and this stuffed version was a big hit for her 4th birthday. Plays the song just like she hears it in the videos and Baby Shark is her favorite. Carries it around and sleeps with it still 3 months later. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler grandson two months before Christmas. When it arrived , it didn’t work, song would not play. I replaced the button batteries and it played the shark song but not very loud. Was dead again, when I got it out to wrap Xmas eve. Replaced the batteries again which is expensive. Played the song 3 or 4 times and quit working. What a dud. Of course, return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: D.G.

customer_reviews.title: Defective - Batteries last less than 1 day
customer_reviews.text: Its soft and cute. The lower volume of the song is perfect for a toy that your toddler will play the song on repetitively. Having easily changeable batteries on a singing plush seemed like a great idea until it devoured the batteries and the replacements in 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. I like it also because you can stop the music if needed. My granddaughter is going to love it. It’s very huggable too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Baby shark
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to give this to my Granddaughter, she loves baby shark but with the corvid 19 I don’t know when I will get to see her to give it to her.. 😷😷😢 It was a Easter gift..
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Does not play full song, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this item. It leaves out grandma and grandpa, ends on let's go hunt... The volume is very low. Gave it two stars because it's cute and easy to press the button, however, I would not have purchased if I knew the entire song was not included. Get it together SHARKS!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: christineelise

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT play whole song.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t play the whole song. It’s already a short song and on this toy it doesn’t even play the whole thing! I bought this so my son could play on repeat himself... well that’s a bust cause his favorite part isn’t even on there! I would not have bought if I had known, as I don’t think it’s worth it. Should have read reviews. :(
customer_reviews.author: HunnieB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but quiet
customer_reviews.text: The shark itself is nice and well made, but the music is very soft. For some parents this may be a plus, but we had to literally stop what we were doing while our daughter pushed the toy to make it play. It has special batteries which we haven't had to change yet. but its only been a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this toy! Not as advertised and poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for our 3 year old. Very disappointed. It advertises playing 4 verses of the Baby Shark song, but ours only plays a snippet of 1 verse and cuts out mid-sentence. The toy also came with some small red stains on it. I have contacted WowWee Customer Service and I am currently STILL jumping through hoops going back and forth with them trying to replace a stupid $17 toy. I would just like to give my daughter a working toy!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Take your chances 50/50 with the sound box
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had read the reviews, then I wouldn’t have been so disappointed when I found out the sound box was faulty - I took the batteries out and re-inserted them & still no luck. I was super excited to give this to my 9month old; he can’t help but dance any time he hears the baby shark song but I’m sure he’ll still love it without the music. I don’t want to go through the hassle of returning it with a high risk of getting another one with the same issues so I’ll just buy some new batteries and see if that’s works.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for baby shark fans but too quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, my toddler is obsessed with Baby Shark! I was excited to get her this toy for Christmas and she was equally as excited to receive it! My only issue is that it’s very quiet. I actually had to open the back of it and move the speaker so that it was right up against the Velcro backing to be able to hear it better, and it’s still not very loud. I’d recommend the manufacturers up the volume a bit with future productions.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Buy one of each!
customer_reviews.text: Perfection for the baby shark obsessed kiddos. Pretty cuddly and the song is shortened for the sanity of parents. I ended up having to get one of each for all the kids because the first was such a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: My 15 Month Old can't get enough!
customer_reviews.text: I swear my daughter said "Baby Shark" (or in her talk "Bay-Shar!") before she said Momma! We were so excited to give it to her, we don't know if she plays it so much because she loves it, or because she thinks we do lol Super cute and it isn't so loud that it annoys you, but loud enough for her to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Annoying and Loving
customer_reviews.text: You will have a love hate relationship with this toy. It's annoying to hear the song, but when I see my kids hug and sing with the shark, I smile. Baby Shark is great. I washed it for the first time, and it doesn't hold up too well, but my daughter still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dezzi

customer_reviews.title: Service a response
customer_reviews.text: It is very disappointing to send out a toy that you have to put up to your ear to hear the song. I asked for help about it no one responded Don’t disappoint kids with it. You can hardly hear it
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s bigger than I expected Great for one year olds hands. Nice quality Song lyrics are on key and not too loud but loud enough. I ordered this and the Baby Shark book for my Granson’s first birthday. Carter will love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria K Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for baby shark enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! And so does my baby shark obsessed toddler. Its soft and thick. The only downside is the button to make it sing is in the tail, so you cant really "hug" it to make it sing.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is an official toy... my guy loves it! Really soft and the volume for the music is perfect, even if he wants to lay his head on it while the music plays... not too loud for his ears while still audible.
customer_reviews.author: L mor

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 18 month old grandson. He watches the show and I thought he would get a kick out of holding the shark Baby and I was right. Want to make a little one laugh.. purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Selected by older sisters for 2 yr old sister gift
customer_reviews.text: My 2 young granddaughters selected this out of the Amazon Christmas catalog as a gift for their sisters 2nd birthday. It is really cute and instantly became favorited by all three girls.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Disappointed, but decently priced.
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I’d wish for a louder toy for my daughter, but I’m a little disappointed. The volume is low, it would be nice if you could adjust the volume. Would also be better if it played the complete song. Decent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: BCG

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun and great deal too
customer_reviews.text: While we had hoped that this toy would play the full song, it only plays 3 verses (baby, mommy, daddy, lets go hunt). But my daughter is still thrilled with it! Best thing for parents? It’s volume is such that your ears won’t bleed, even after your kid plays it for the four billionth time in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: April H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It was really cute and my son immediately took to it but it only lasted a couple of days before the batteries wouldn't work. Which is no big deal until we got new batteries and it did it twice now. After a week out no longer worked which really disappointed my son.
customer_reviews.author: robin19

customer_reviews.title: Your little one will love this stuffed shark
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these cute soft lovable stuffed animals for my littles for Christmas. It plays the baby shark song when you squeeze the bottom half of body. Very happy with this adorable toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!! Slightly hard to turn on the music
customer_reviews.text: We love this baby shark. The only issue is that it’s hard for my 2 and 3 year olds to find the sound box and press exactly where they should to turn on the music
customer_reviews.author: Weaks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, you can definitely feel and see the difference with this plush vs cheap knock-offs. Sound is good quality as well. Have had for a week, toddler playing with it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my great granddaughter she likes the song but the song is not loud we have to take the speaker out of the shark for her to hear it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter’s new buddy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this as a birthday gift for my daughter and it has been an eye candy for her. This is her most favorite birthday present, the gadgets that was gifted to her has beaten down by this soft and cute plush toy.
customer_reviews.author: daphnedoobeedoo

customer_reviews.title: Well made and super soft!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this baby shark! Perfect size, sound is perfect level (I know this is one of the most important things for me 😉) and it’s super soft. Worth every penny! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any kid that likes baby shark
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves this baby shark! It plays the baby shark song but not the whole song. Ones the song starts you and squeeze it again to stop the singing.
customer_reviews.author: LRR

customer_reviews.title: Super soft.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Santa gave it to her for Christmas. He removed the voice box that sings the sing beforehand. Easily taken out and put back in. She carries it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: KBS

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grandson's birthday. He loves this so much.He sleeps with it and when he wakes it is the first thing he plays with.
customer_reviews.author: MBZ

customer_reviews.title: Battery inside is arrived dead... and there is no way to change it.
customer_reviews.text: My son was SO excited for this baby shark to arrive... but it arrived without a totally dead battery. You can't open it up to change the battery, so now I paid for a shark that sings... and it doesn't sing. I am very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: It's soft and cuddly. My baby shark obsessed toddler loves it, my only complaint is the volume is too soft. You have to be holding it close to hear it, maybe that's a blessing though..
customer_reviews.author: Megan P.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, well made, and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the baby shark for my 10 month old granddaughter after we watched the video on you tube. She got so excited when I gave it to her she started to dance. It’s very well made and super soft. She has many toys but this is clearly one of her favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great character representation
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! The only downfall is that the volume is super low so it’s got to be practically silent in the house/room to hear it! LoL BUT it’s nice that you can stop the song and start it when you want (a feature more toys need). Great deal if your mainly looking to have the cartoon figure and not necessarily the song.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fix Volume
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the 2mins song to play, but it only does a few seconds of baby shark. The volume is super low and isn't adjustable. We can barely hear it. Definitely not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: We got ours in a couple of days ago and it’s sooo cute! It’s not quiet at all but not loud, I think it’s perfect! My kids heard it from across the apartment. It’s really soft and I like that you can turn it off if needed. My son will love it!
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Daughter LOVES
customer_reviews.text: This shark is precious! It doesn't sing the entire song, but I mean would you really expect that?? LOL My 3 year old really loves it. The shark is very soft! My only complaint is it really isn't very loud...other than that it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect for my great nephew. He loves baby shark and loves the song. So this was the right gift. He is carrying it around and trying to sing along with his shark.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gag Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband as a gag gift and was a huge hit. Plush is soft, and the voice box is loud enough to hear, but soft enough that you won’t go insane and throw it out haha. I bought the english version from Amazon and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Can hardly hear this, but that’s ok. I won’t mind when the kids play it over and over and over again. As you can see in the video this little stinker loves baby shark. ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: MOMOF3INPA

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is obsessed! The button is a little tricky to push (the box is near the tail) and it plays only half the song but since I hear it a million times a day from his book or YouTube...it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria H

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter who is 2 1/2 is obsessed with Baby Shark. This was bought for her for a Christmas present. Even though it doesn't sing the whole song, she is going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Stoeckel

customer_reviews.title: My baby girl love it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: My baby love it a lot, she hug the baby shake when she is going to sleep. The volume is just alright for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lim Siong Chuan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for the wee baby shark lovers!
customer_reviews.text: My baby is in love with baby shark and boy was she in love with this teddy! It is exactly as described. The song is clear and of great volume. She travels with it everywhere and sleeps with it. Completely satisfied with this purchase. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SNP

customer_reviews.title: Toddler win
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 1 year olds birthday. She absolutely loves it. My favorite feature is you can turn it on and off by squeezing the baby shark.
customer_reviews.author: Nitenglo

customer_reviews.title: Cute stuffed animals for any baby shark fan
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves anything baby shark and has all three of the song playing stuffed animals. They all play music and have a velcro opening in the back to replace (or remove) batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Cody S.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st Bday gift. 💛
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a 1st bday gift for my granddaughter. Almost 4 months later she's still running around with her shark & singing. Soft.... Big enough to enjoy & small enough for her tiny hugs. She's happy so we love this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it! The Baby Shark song wasn’t extremely loud when playing, which was perfect for me lol, and I loved that he could press it to play the song but stop it anytime instead of the whole song going off by itself
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Grandson LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I want to add a photo, but I can't get the reviews to come up on my Amazon phone app. This is great! It's not a tiny thing. This is good-sized. My grandson is 14.5 months. It's perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this! The volume of the song is at a nice level so it doesn't become annoying like some louder repeatative songs can be. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

product_meta.title: WowWee Pinkfong Baby Shark Official Song Doll - Baby Shark
product_meta.description: Meet the famous shark family singing plush doll. You won't be able to cuddle them enough! Squeeze the tummy to hear the baby shark song, the global sensation with over 3. 3 billion views! Collect all 3 of your favorite sharks: baby shark, mommy shark and Daddy shark!
feature_bullets: Produced by WowWee for Pinkfong, official creator of the global hit song Baby Shark!
Squeeze the tummy to hear 4 verses of the Baby Shark song (English version)!
Super soft plush makes this shark your new cuddle buddy!
Collect all 3 of your favorite characters!
The product dimensions are 6. 9 x 8. 3 x 11 (inches)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,832 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
